Title: QatarEnergy picks Sinopec as North Field East LNG project partner; first Asian shareholder
Description: QatarEnergy has selected China’s state-owned Sinopec as a shareholder in its 32 mtpa North Field East LNG project, making the Chinese firm the project’s first Asian shareholder.
Author: CK

Title: Vopak scraps plan to invest in Hong Kong FSRU due to LNG terminal project delay
Description: Dutch infrastructure firm Vopak is no longer planning to invest in a firm that owns the 263,000 m3 Bauhinia Spirit floating storage regasification unit that will be installed at Hong Kong’s new LNG import terminal, attributing its decision to the project’s delay.
Author: CK

Title: Vopak to take 50% stake in Gasunie’s EemsEnergy LNG terminal in the Netherlands
Description: Dutch infrastructure firm Vopak has signed an agreement with Gasunie to take a 50% stake in the EemsEnergy LNG terminal in the Netherlands. The transaction is expected to be completed by Oct. 1.
Author: CK
